title: Set LinkedIn photo as profile picture in Hero section

requirements.text: Download the image from the URL https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/v2/D4D03AQG_vKIcM3o7oQ/profile-displayphoto-scale_400_400/B4DZw8fRO0HwAg-/0/1770541359476?e=1773878400&v=beta&t=hNLsHkQFnEh-Boegm1kbBhX7F8u1P42PUa-DT2DJzkk and save it as a static asset (frontend/public/assets/generated/profile-photo.png), then update the HeroSection component to use this local asset as the profile picture image source instead of any existing placeholder or external URL.

quotes: set this image as profile picture

acceptanceCriteria: The profile photo displayed in the HeroSection matches the provided LinkedIn image.
The image is served from frontend/public/assets/generated/profile-photo.png (no external URL dependency).
The existing fallback-on-error behavior in HeroSection is preserved.

constraints: Do not modify any files under frontend/src/hooks/ or frontend/src/components/ui/.
Do not alter any CV data or other sections.
nonGoals: Changing any other CV content or layout.
